mapper.select: select * from config where uid= #{uid} and type=#{type}

select c.uid, c.marketAmount, c.rate, `apikey` as `type`, `secretkey` as lossWorkingType from config c, user u where c.uid = u.id and type=#{type} and autoTrade = 1 and u.role like "%"#{lossWorkingType}"%"
mapper.update: UPDATE config SET marketAmount = #{marketAmount}, limitAmount = #{limitAmount}, maxLoss = #{maxLoss}, tradeOffset = #{tradeOffset}, lossTriggerOffset = #{lossTriggerOffset}, lossEntrustOffset = #{lossEntrustOffset}, lossWorkingType = #{lossWorkingType}, lossType = #{lossType}, rate = #{rate}, autoTrade = #{autoTrade}, autoCancel = #{autoCancel} WHERE id = #{id}
